solution_line_template: Since the area of a triangle is given by {triangle_area_factor} base*height, the area of the triangular-shaped house of cards that Zion made is {triangle_area_factor}*{base_measurement}*{height_measurement} = <<{triangle_area_factor}*{base_measurement}*{height_measurement}={zion_house_area}>>{zion_house_area} square centimeters.

If two of his friend also built similar shaped houses, the total area of their triangular-shaped house of cards is {zion_house_area}+{zion_house_area}=<<{zion_house_area}+{zion_house_area}={friends_houses_area}>>{friends_houses_area} square centimeters.

Together with Zion, they all built triangular-shaped houses of cards with a combined area of {friends_houses_area}+{zion_house_area}=<<{friends_houses_area}+{zion_house_area}={total_combined_area}>>{total_combined_area} square centimeters.
